sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSM0200 ( SYS_DIV_CD , MNU_CD , HHRK_MNU_CD , MNU_NM , MNU_ICN , MNU_TMBL , MNU_AUTH_FRM_CD , MNU_TIP_NM , MNU_SCN_FRM_PKG_NM , MNU_PRNT_YN , MNU_PRNT_ORD , USE_YN , MNU_EPLN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , INPT_ADDR ) VALUES ( #sysDivCd# , #mnuCd# , #hhrkMnuCd# , #mnuNm# , #mnuIcn# , #mnuTmbl# , #mnuAuthFrmCd# , #mnuTipNm# , #mnuScnFrmPkgNm# , #mnuPrntYn# , #mnuPrntOrd# , #useYn# , #mnuEpln# , #kybdr# , SYSDATE , #ismt# , SYSDATE , #revnAddr# , #inptAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SYSM0200 SET SYS_DIV_CD=#sysDivCd# , MNU_CD=#mnuCd# , HHRK_MNU_CD=#hhrkMnuCd# , MNU_NM=#mnuNm# , MNU_ICN=#mnuIcn# , MNU_TMBL=#mnuTmbl# , MNU_AUTH_FRM_CD=#mnuAuthFrmCd# , MNU_TIP_NM=#mnuTipNm# , MNU_SCN_FRM_PKG_NM=#mnuScnFrmPkgNm# , MNU_PRNT_YN=#mnuPrntYn# , MNU_PRNT_ORD=#mnuPrntOrd# , USE_YN=#useYn# , MNU_EPLN=#mnuEpln# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=SYSDATE , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=SYSDATE , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# WHERE SYS_DIV_CD=#sysDivCd# AND MNU_CD=#mnuCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSM0200 WHERE SYS_DIV_CD=#sysDivCd# AND MNU_CD=#mnuCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SYS_DIV_CD , MNU_CD , HHRK_MNU_CD , MNU_NM , MNU_ICN , MNU_TMBL , MNU_AUTH_FRM_CD , MNU_TIP_NM , MNU_SCN_FRM_PKG_NM , MNU_PRNT_YN , MNU_PRNT_ORD , USE_YN , MNU_EPLN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , INPT_ADDR FROM SYSM0200 WHERE SYS_DIV_CD=#sysDivCd# AND MNU_CD=#mnuCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SYS_DIV_CD , MNU_CD , HHRK_MNU_CD , MNU_NM , MNU_ICN , MNU_TMBL , MNU_AUTH_FRM_CD , MNU_TIP_NM , MNU_SCN_FRM_PKG_NM , MNU_PRNT_YN , MNU_PRNT_ORD , USE_YN , MNU_EPLN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , INPT_ADDR FROM SYSM0200 WHERE 1=1
SYS_DIV_CD = #searchKeyword#
MNU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SYSM0200 WHERE 1=1
SYS_DIV_CD = #searchKeyword#
MNU_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
